dmca.title: Database Systems wants CallCenterSoftwares De-Listed
dmca.body:
User Support:

This is our formal complaint against the website owner of www.callcentersoftwares.com whose site is currently listed in your search engine index. This site is infringing on our copyrighted website information. We request that you review this site and remove the page listed below from the Google search results until this site owner removes ALL of our website content that has been illegally copied.

(1)	Our Copyrighted material is located here: http://www.databasesystemscorp.com/

(2)	The offending website page that contains our copyrighted material is located here:

http://callcentersoftwares.com/product_predictive_dialer.asp

The site owner has concealed his identity by using a proxy registration (GoDaddy.com)

EXAMPLE OF GOGGLE SEARCH

The following is an example of how this website owner is illegally using our copyrighted material. By typing in a search term "predict dialers translates into direct savings
